transcript: Do you think this is what I had in mind? You think that when I proposed I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road We ended up on a beach arguing over fish? You think that I knew that there would be times when you would look at me like I was used Kleenex or that I would look at you and think holy hell it wins the next flight to Alaska?

segments.text: Do you think this is what I had in mind?
You think that when I proposed I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road
We ended up on a beach arguing over fish?
You think that I knew that there would be times when you would look at me like I was used
Kleenex or that I would look at you and think holy hell it wins the next flight to Alaska?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You think this is what I had in mind?  You think that when I propose I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road, we will end up on a beach arguing over fish. You think that I knew that there would be times when you will look at me like I am used Kleenex?  Or that I will look at you and think, holy hell what's the next flight to Alaska.
